conversation.content: Is this weekend a good time to go hiking in Yosemite? Find some popular trails.

The weather in Yosemite this weekend will be sunny with a high of 18Â°C, which is great for hiking. Popular trails for this time of year include the Mist Trail to Vernal Fall and the Mirror Lake Loop.
